result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tyler C. Lemma

records.addlTxt: Intake Report- Marathon County Pretrial Services  - Completed 10-11-2022
Pre-trial conference on November 16, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Clerk: Amanda.
Case called at 8:40 am. 
INCLUDES: 22CM588, 22CM952 and 22FO77. 

State of Wisconsin appears by ADA Rory McGarry.  Defendant FAILS to appear. 

Date and Time set for Status Hearing.  VRCW. 

COURT AUTHORIZES $1,000 BENCH WARRANT and ORDERS BOND FORFEITED. 

8:42 am Defendant NOW appears. 

COURT VACATES WARRANT AND BOND FORFEITURE.

State notes new criminal charges were recently filed; 
PTC set for 11/16 at 11:00 am. 

W.L. makes statement. 
Adj: 8:46 am.

No contact with victim(s): R.B.Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (4) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk: Heather. 
Case called: 2:22 p.m. 

State appears by ADA Alex Lech.  Defendant appears from MCJ via Zoom, pro se.

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
PLEA: NOT GUILTY on CM's

COURT ORDERS: $1,000.00 cash bond. 

CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s): R.B. or their residence. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

DATES:
SH: 10/20/22 @ 8:30 a.m.

Adjourned: 2:32 p.m.
